Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win11 x32,Win11 x64,Win12 x32,Win12 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This is a special office suite release for Windows 7 and beyond...
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: 1024 x 768 Display Size | Windows 7 and Beyond... x86 / x64

English.Char_Desc_45: Professional office suite for all Windows PCs
English.Char_Desc_80: Professional office suite for all Windows Desktop PCs with full admin rights.
English.Char_Desc_250: This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few.
English.Char_Desc_450: This is not your run-of-the-mill office suite, it's a productivity and user-experience upgrade! This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
This is not your run-of-the-mill office suite, it's a productivity and user-experience upgrade! This office suite introduces some new innovative concepts in interface design and user-friendly application interaction. You get instant system access, top class application design and a cleaner desktop to name a few. With its full 32-bit architecture and stability, it can improve your productivity and document format compatibility. Export your documents to multiple formats.
The graphical-user-interface has been made into a more iconic-toolbar, mouse centrist type of interface. This increases user-interaction speed and user productivity. This office suite was created to be as useful as possible to whoever needed a free office suite. So... if you enjoy a more uncluttered desktop, cleaner looking application interfaces, and faster software interaction, then this office suite is for You!
Create a cleaner desktop with enhanced performance and advanced application interfaces. Main applications have full administrator rights for best performance to provide you an enhanced user experience on any computer hardware, desktop or laptop!
Now you can install SSuite Office without all the annoying and irritating Windows "Administrator" popups when running applications from the PC Mac Dock on your Windows Desktop!
Installation Instructions:
- Make sure you have a default printer selected on your system, any printer selection will work.
Features in SSuite Office:
- PC Desktop Dock - Thumbnail Previews - Direct System Access - Network File Transfers - Custom Template Library - Multi-Display compatible - Tabbed document interfaces - Create WordArt and Math Equations / Expressions in WordGraph - Export your documents to PDF, PNG, GIF, JPG, BMP, EMF, TIFF and SSP.
.
New Online Edition Available: https://desktop.ssuiteoffice.com/ .
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software. Saving the planet one bit at a time!
